title: Jussie Smollett Verdict: Actor Found Guilty of Lying to Police in Faking a Hate Crime
sub_head: Former ‘Empire’ star convicted on five of six counts
body:
CHICAGO—Actor Jussie Smollett was found guilty of lying to police when he reported being the victim of a hate crime in the early morning hours of a frigid night near his apartment nearly three years ago.
A Cook County jury found Mr. Smollett guilty of five of the six counts of felony disorderly conduct against him. Each count carries up to three years in prison, although he could also face probation based on his lack of previous felony convictions.
